name: AlterWare Tactics
description:
In AlterWare Tactics you have to beat your friends into submission by giving orders to your hardware and software. Watch the orders unfold in semi-predictable chaos.

Platform: PC, Windows
Controls: 4 controllers (recommended), up to 2 keyboard configs
Single Player: Not supported at this time
Local Multiplayer: 2 to 4 players
Online Multiplayer: Not supported at this time

Message from the developers: help us understand if this game should be developed further into a full fledged release. Thanks!
